mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Studies (study_leader_idx, study_title, description_title, description, category, study_online, meeting_time, latitude, longitude, age, capacity, gender, start_date, end_date, status, created_at) VALUES (#{studyLeaderIdx}, #{studyTitle},#{descriptionTitle}, #{description}, #{category}, #{studyOnline}, #{meetingTime}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{age}, #{capacity}, #{gender}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{status}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT study_idx FROM Studies WHERE study_leader_idx = #{userIdx} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO StudyMembers (study_idx, user_idx, role, status, join_reason, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{studyIdx}, #{userIdx}, #{role}, #{status}, #{joinReason}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT sm.study_idx AS studyIdx, sm.role, s.study_title AS studyTitle, s.description FROM StudyMembers sm JOIN Studies s ON sm.study_idx = s.study_idx WHERE sm.user_idx = #{userIdx}
SELECT m.user_idx, m.name FROM StudyMembers sm INNER JOIN Users m ON sm.user_idx = m.user_idx WHERE sm.study_idx = #{studyIdx}
